data.title: 10th U.S. Cavalry Roster, 1898
data.meta_description: Tenth U.S. Cavalry Roster, 1898, Spanish American War
data.text:
10th U.S. Cavalry Roster - Spanish American War 1898

By Anthony L. Powell, Historian, Consultant,

Curator of the National Exhibition of the Buffalo Soldiers Please Visit our Home Page to learn more about the Spanish American War Field and Staff ||| Band ||| Troop A ||| Troop B ||| Troop C ||| Troop D ||| Troop E ||| Troop F

Troop G ||| Troop H ||| Troop I ||| Troop K ||| Troop L ||| Troop M For information on most soldiers listed contact Mr. Powell at apowell@earthlink.net or call 408-448-2260 or fax 408-269-1548 * Killed ** Wounded *** Awarded Medal Of Honor **** Certificate of Merit (Today's DSC) ***** Commissioned from the ranks. For a history of this unit, please click here

For information on Black Participation in the Spanish American War, click here Field & Staff Officers:
